testimonials.quote: HABC & Beauty transformed not just my hair, but my confidence. Caroline is a true artist!
testimonials.author: Maria Rodriguez

testimonials.quote: The best salon experience I've ever had. Professional, clean, and the results are always amazing.
testimonials.author: Jennifer Lee

reviews.name: Beverly Aligwekwe
reviews.comment: Excellent place to be for your hair in a very professional relaxed atmosphere. World class beauty salons enjoy it

reviews.name: Masambaga Kichuna
reviews.comment: It was nice experience my hair was perfectly done,see you soon HABC you are my number one hair doctor.

reviews.name: Getrude Gonzo
reviews.comment: Very professional and neat. She does her work with passion.

reviews.name: liz Hua
reviews.comment: Excellent customer service. Was satisfied with what i got. Keep it up

reviews.name: Zipporah Mokhaneli
reviews.comment: This has to be the best Salon I have ever went to all my life‚ù§Ô∏è their service is top tier. Quality hair and treatment, I have personally reached a point where I wouldn't want anyone to touch my hair except Caroline

reviews.name: Eva Maina
reviews.comment: Carol is very friendly and informative....with my sisterlock journey she has done an amazing job.....keep up carol...

reviews.name: Yvonne Jurarim
reviews.comment: I had a great experience with my deep conditioning and silk press with Carol! You can truly tell she has a passion for what she does‚Äîit shows not only in her work but in how she cares for her clients. If you're looking for a stylist who genuinely loves what she does and takes pride in her craft.

reviews.name: Wairimu Muchungi
reviews.comment: Carol is dedicated to her job. Always on the dot when it comes to time. Her work is superb

reviews.name: Janet Kenda
reviews.comment: I installed my sister locks in December while I was in Kenya üá∞üá™. I wasn't sure who would maintain them once I returned to Texas. However, I didn't have to look far. I encountered Carol at our Kenya Women's group, which had rave reviews of her work. She did a great job with me and was such great company. Needless to say, I am sold!

reviews.name: Wendy Lewis
reviews.comment: Caroline is an excellent hair stylist who listens to her clients. She has done the crochet style and a full weave on my hair, and each style has been perfect.
